org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces
Class XAFileSystemProxy

java.lang.Object
  org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces.XAFileSystemProxy

public abstract class XAFileSystemProxy
extends Object

This is a utility class for booting new XADisk instances and obtaining references to existing XADisk instances on the same JVM or remote JVMs.

There are three utility methods in this class. All these three methods return an object implementing XAFileSystem interface, which is a reference to either a native XADisk instance, or a remote XADisk instance depending on the method used.

Since:
1.0

Constructor Summary
XAFileSystemProxy()
           
 
Method Summary
static XAFileSystem bootNativeXAFileSystem(StandaloneFileSystemConfiguration configuration)
          If an application wants to boot an XADisk instance in the same JVM (native XADisk instance), it can call this method.
static XAFileSystem getNativeXAFileSystemReference(String instanceId)
          If an application wants to connect to an already-booted XADisk instance in the same JVM (native XADisk instance), it can call this method.
static XAFileSystem getRemoteXAFileSystemReference(String serverAddres, int serverPort)
          If an application wants to connect to an XADisk instance running on a remote JVM, it can call this method.

Constructor Detail

XAFileSystemProxy

public XAFileSystemProxy()
Method Detail

getNativeXAFileSystemReference

public static XAFileSystem getNativeXAFileSystemReference(String instanceId)
If an application wants to connect to an already-booted XADisk instance in the same JVM (native XADisk instance), it can call this method.

Parameters:
instanceId - the instance-id of the XADisk instance.
Returns:
a reference to the native XADisk instance if an XADisk instance has already been booted in the same JVM; otherwise null .

bootNativeXAFileSystem

public static XAFileSystem bootNativeXAFileSystem(StandaloneFileSystemConfiguration configuration)
If an application wants to boot an XADisk instance in the same JVM (native XADisk instance), it can call this method.

Parameters:
configuration - the configuration object specifying the settings with which the XADisk instance should be booted.
Returns:
a reference to the native XADisk instance.

getRemoteXAFileSystemReference

public static XAFileSystem getRemoteXAFileSystemReference(String serverAddres,
                                                          int serverPort)
If an application wants to connect to an XADisk instance running on a remote JVM, it can call this method.

Parameters:
serverAddres - the network address/name of the remote machine on which the XADisk instance is running.
serverPort - the network port of the remote machine on which the XADisk instance is listening for requests.
Returns:
a reference to the remote XADisk instance.
